about_the_game:
"Thousand Islands" - 4 square kilometers of American fishing. The location is home to 30 species of fish, from small shiner and crappie, to large maskinong, salmon and lake sturgeon + high-speed bassbot for quick movement around the pond.

The location is available after purchase for any level and at any time. After purchasing this DLC, you need to re-enter the game.


The Thousand Islands is a unique natural attraction on the border of Canada and the United States. This is a huge archipelago consisting of 1,864 islands. The chain of islands stretches for 80 km along the St. Lawrence River from its source, Lake Ontario. The game features only a small piece of this amazing place on the St. Lawrence River. Try real American fishing, including bass fishing and big chinook salmon hunting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GF640
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GF1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
